happy: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
sad: It’s okay to not be okay. I'm here with you.
Tears are words that need to be written.
tired: You’ve made it this far. Keep going.
Even slow progress is still progress.
inspired: Keep going! Even errors lead to growth.
You’re doing better than you think.
